Posts.Content: Hi I have a ? about this shot? I am  asking if anyone has gotten this shot and if there is any  side effects. I am now taking tamoxifen for one month and I was told there are many side effects to this pill. Thanks liz
Posts.Title: lupron shot?

Posts.Content: I am a 25 year hodgkins and now have stage 1 breast cancer and was told i can have IORT to remove tumor.  I have a lot of questions and need some answers can any one help me!   Thanks Liz
Posts.Title: ?Hodgkin's lymphoma survivor and now stage1 breast cancer

Posts.Content: On Jun 02, 2011 2:54 AMOKnowwrote: Has anyone out there experienced breast cancer as a long term side effect to radiation? I had cobalt mantle radiation in 1980 for Hodgkin's. Everything was great for 15 years, but then I started having problems: thyroid cancer, bowel obstructions caused by adhesions (scar tissue), breast cancer, pulmonary fibrosis, aortic valve damage....all attributed to radiation (not anecdotally, but by all of the doctors). The breast cancer was the one that really threw me, because I hadn't heard about that as a potential side effect. I'd love to hear from anyone who has experienced. BC or any long term side effects from radiation. Thank you! I had cobalt mantle radiation in 1985 for Hodgkin's. Everything was great for  intill 2010  but then I started having problems first thyroid cancer 2010 and may 2012 breast cancer. the doctor told me that i got both from having radiation. If any one would like to talk please call Message edited by CancerCompass staff. For personal protection, phone number removed. Consider private reply. Please review CancerCompass Member Guidelines athttp://www.cancercompass.com/common/guidelines.html  liz
